profileAlternative.name: Lorenzo Spinelli
profileAlternative.headline: I write code presso Register.it
profileAlternative.summary:
Hello!

For more than 10 years I worked in teams with a lot of different people, learning to enhance them to build and reach a common goal, in the most (hopefully) efficient way.

I developed specific ability in software developing and web application design, in combination with security issues analysis and administration problem solving and blah blah blah, blah blah bla...

I like to call me resourceful, highly motivated, collaborative, ambitious when needed, helpful, honest, and most of all: really PASSIONATE.

I lose my energy when working on boring stuff, and that's why I'm always interested in learning new things

Ciao!

Sono più di 10 anni che lavoro in team di persone con capacità molto differenziate, imparando a valorizzarle e usarle nel modo più efifciente (spero) per raggiungere uno scopo comune

Ho sviluppato specifiche abilità nello sviluppo di software, progettazione e design di
applicazioni web. In combinazione con la capacità di diagnosi e soluzione dei relativi problemi
di sicurezza ed amministrazione e bla bla bla, bla bla bla...

Mi piace chiamarmi intraprendente, motivato, collaborativo, ambizioso quando serve, disponibile, serio, e soprattutto molto APPASSIONATO.

Perdo le energie solo quando lavoro a qualcosa di noioso, e questo è il motivo per cui sono sempre interessato a impararare cose nuove.

positions.title: writes Java and JavaScript code using Spring and React.js
positions.description:
I write Java and Javascript code using the Spring framework and React.js stack.
We do continuous integration and deploy using Jenkins and Docker(s) and we pay a lot of attention in unit and integration testing, while building our apps.
We call us an "Agile Company", my team does Kanban for software development.
I'm currently working on these projects:
https://spid.register.it : SPID aka Italian Digital Identity Public Service
https://www.register.it/pec/ : PEC aka Certified Email

Scrivo codice Java e Javascript usando il framework Spring e lo stack React.js
Facciamo continuous integration e deploy usando Jenkins e Docker e facciamo molta attenzione ai test unitari e di integrazione, mentre creiamo le nostre applicazioni.
Ci chiamiamo una azienda "Agile", nel mio team facciamo Kanban per sviluppare il codice.
Attualmente lavoro a questi progetti:
https://spid.register.it : SPID (Sistema Pubblico di Identità Digitale)
https://www.register.it/pec/ : PEC (Posta Elettronica Certificata)
…
see more

positions.title: Systems Analyst / Senior Java Designer/Developer
positions.description:
I did analysis and development of web applications using Spring Mvc and AngularJS.
Ansible helped us to build and ship the packages we developed.
We use MongoDB as NOSQL database engine and Oracle, as a SQL base.
We build a platform able to manage up to 1 milion transactions per day.
With my team we developed a platform of REST and SOAP services, for the italian and worlwide
healthcare system, using IHE (https://www.ihe.net/ : Integrating the Healthcare Enterprise)
interoperability standards.
We also developed UI application, mainly using AngularJS and Oauth for security. These
Application are mostly employed in hospitals, clinics, emergency rooms and by the citizens
(electronic health records).
…
see more

positions.title: independent contractor agreement
positions.description:
Digital Edition (CDROM) of “Quaderni del Carcere” (Prison Notebook) by Antonio Gramsci.
distributed on national scale by daily newspaper “L’Unità”.
Java based Desktop program.
I did the analysis, development and graphics.
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4AQO8UD1L0I/TlUbk75FmEI/AAAAAAAAC14/wHD1D3B4sQ0/s1600/frontqdc.jpg
